title: Leeds sign Tyler Roberts from West Brom on three-and-a-half-year deal
description: Leeds have completed the signing of forward Tyler Roberts from West Brom on a three-and-a-half-year deal.
content:
Sky Sports News reported on Tuesday that the clubs had agreed a £2.5m deal for Roberts.
The 19-year-old made his debut for the Baggies in the 1-1 Premier League draw with Liverpool back in May 2016 and has since had loan spells at Oxford United and Shrewsbury Town.
He has spent the first half of this season on loan to League One Walsall, where he has scored five goals in 19 appearances.
Roberts has also represented Wales at youth level, earning five caps and one goal for the U21 side.
He could make his Leeds debut in Saturday's Sky Bet Championship clash against Cardiff City at Elland Road.
